metadata.description: A collection of powerful Claude Code skills by yrzhe. Includes intelligent web scraping, automation, and productivity tools.

plugins.name: intelligent-web-scraper
plugins.description: Self-learning intelligent web scraper agent - automatically analyzes page structure, handles pagination, anti-blocking, and discovers article series. No user configuration needed - AI decides everything.

plugins.name: feishu-bot-dev
plugins.description: 飞书机器人配置与开发完整指南。支持零代码（机器人助手）和全代码（开放平台API）两种模式，包含发消息、创建文档、管理群组等功能。

plugins.name: akshare-a-shares
plugins.description: 针对中国A股的行情与数据查询（基于本地 akshare 源代码与API映射）。当用户请求获取A股实时行情、历史K线（日/周/月）、分钟级分时（1/5/15/30/60）、复权数据（前复权/后复权）、股东户数（含详情）、以及巨潮资讯公告披露结果时使用本Skill。

plugins.name: youtube-data-api
plugins.description: YouTube Data API v3 complete wrapper - search videos, get video/channel/playlist details, get comments, download subtitles, etc. Supports filtering and sorting by time/views/rating and more.
